title: Clean 7
description: Clean 7 is a 7-Day detox program that blends Intermittent Fasting, Ayurveda, and Functional Medicine for powerful and fast results.
cleaned_text: Clean 7 is a 7-Day detox program that blends Intermittent Fasting, Ayurveda, and Functional Medicine for powerful and fast results. Supports Core Functions: - Questions? [Ask about this product](/pages/contact) [California Residents: Warning](#shopify-section-prop65) Free, Fast Shipping Quality Ingredients 100% Toxin-Free Why It Works Clean 7 blends the principles of Ayurveda, an ancient holistic healing science, Intermittent Fasting, a fasting and eating pattern, and Functional Medicine, an integrative medical practice that addresses the root cause of bodily issues to provide whole-body wellness. How to use Clean 7 includes: - 14 Vegan, Gluten-free Cleanse Supplement packs - 11 Vegan, Gluten-free Cleanse Shakes packets - One 20-serving tea box - Digital Cleanse Guide - Complementary support from our team of Wellness Coaches During Clean 7, on most days you'll enjoy a shake for breakfast, a solid meal for lunch, a shake for dinner, and your Clean 7 supplements throughout the day. On some days, you'll omit breakfast and enjoy tulsi tea to extend your fasting window. Ingredients Clean 7 Shake (Plain): Rice Protein, Pea Protein, Psyllium Blend, Moringa, Tulsi Ashwagandha, Shatavari, IS2). Clean 7 Shake (Chocolate): Cocoa Powder, Rice Protein, Pea Protein, Psyllium Husk, Vana Tulsi Seed, Moringa, Harjor, Ashwagandha, Shatavari, Brahmi, Punarnava, Silicon Dioxide, Psyllium Seed, Stevia Extract Reb A, Vanilla Flavor, Tulsi Blend, Bacillus coagulans (Unique IS2). Clean 7 Shake (Vanilla): Rice Protein, Pea Protein, Psyllium Husk, Vana Tulsi Seed, Vanilla Flavor, Moringa, Harjor, Ashwagandha, Shatavari, (Unique IS2), Stevia Extract Reb A. Clean 7 Supplements: Tulsi (Holy Basil): Tulsi Blend (Holy Basil Leaf, East Indian Basil Leaf) Turmeric Formula: Turmeric Rhizome, Turmeric Rhizome Extract, Ginger Pepper Seed Fruit Triphala: Amla Bibhitaki Vegetable pullulan capsules Clean 7 Tulsi Wellness Tea: Tulsi Blend (Holy Basil Leaf, East Indian Basil Leaf), Gotu Kola Leaf, Ashwagandha Root, Moringa Leaf Try a Sample Get Powerful & Fast Results with Clean 7 Clean 7 involves an easy-to-follow formula of daily Clean shakes, Clean supplements, and Clean whole food recipes to follow. The following three pillars togther create a powerful detox effect on the body. [Learn more about Clean 7](/pages/about-clean-7) The 7 Systems: Supporting Core Functions Our bodies are naturally going through the processes of detoxification, metabolization, and expelling of toxins all the time. At Clean, we address the body's needs holistically using natural Ayurvedic principles, promoting wellness from within. We have developed solutions to boost and nourish each of the 7 Systems that conform the integral wellbeing of our bodies. Health Coaching A wellness coaching session is a 20-minute phone call with a Clean-Certified Health and Wellness Coach, who will help you along with your health journey.
